explanation: Hammer, Screwdriver, Wrench, and Pliers are all fundamental manual hand tools designed for direct mechanical tasks. A Battery is an energy storage device, not a tool itself, though it may power tools.

category: Seven Wonders of the Ancient World
explanation: The Great Pyramid of Giza, Hanging Gardens of Babylon, Colossus of Rhodes, and Lighthouse of Alexandria are all commonly listed among the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. The Parthenon is an ancient Greek temple, but it is not one of the canonical Seven Wonders.
Flicker, Glimmer, Shimmer, and Twinkle are all verbs that describe different ways light moves or appears subtly. Rumble, however, describes a type of low, continuous sound.
